医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示了美国孕产妇死亡率的巨大差异华盛顿大学健康指标与评估研究所和麻省布里格姆总医院的研究人员进行的一项新研究发现，从 1999 年到 2019 年，孕产妇死亡率不断恶化，对某些种族、族裔群体和州的打击比其他群体和州更严重。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Study-sheds-light-on-the-wide-disparities-within-maternal-mortality-rates-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Study-sheds-light-on-the-wide-disparities-within-maternal-mortality-rates-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a874ff3-f2c2-4fe9-b197-418dc20429a7 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 21:36:20 -0400 Study sheds light on the wide disparities within maternal mortality rates in the U.S.
进展停滞：尽管大流行有所缓解，但 2022 年减少肠道感染的努力仍放缓该研究论文的重点是，尽管 COVID-19 大流行的影响有所减弱，但 2022 年肠道感染发病率的降低仍缺乏进展。它强调食品利益相关者和监管机构之间需要共同努力，以减轻家禽屠宰过程中的病原体污染并防止绿叶蔬菜污染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Stalled-progress-Enteric-infection-reduction-efforts-slowed-in-2022-despite-pandemic-easing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Stalled-progress-Enteric-infection-reduction-efforts-slowed-in-2022-despite-pandemic-easing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0be66d4a-6b9b-469a-88a5-10d362117181 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 21:05:00 -0400 Stalled progress: Enteric infection reduction efforts slowed in 2022 despite pandemic easing
废水监测凸显加拿大 COVID-19 病例的严重低估研究调查了加拿大安大略省未经处理的水中的 SARS-CoV-2 水平与 COVID-19 病例和住院治疗之间的相关性。它还强调了废水数据在加强地方决策和 COVID-19 监测系统方面的价值。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Wastewater-surveillance-highlights-significant-underestimation-of-COVID-19-cases-in-Canada.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Wastewater-surveillance-highlights-significant-underestimation-of-COVID-19-cases-in-Canada.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17d3ee93-19e4-418b-a743-636521a0231b Mon, 03 Jul 2023 20:55:00 -0400 Wastewater surveillance highlights significant underestimation of COVID-19 cases in Canada
COVID-19 是否会增加婴儿细菌感染的风险？研究人员评估了接受病毒感染测试的婴儿中细菌性脑膜炎、菌血症和尿路感染的患病率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Does-COVID-19-increase-the-risk-of-bacterial-infections-in-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Does-COVID-19-increase-the-risk-of-bacterial-infections-in-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f7a02e3-8a29-46e2-917e-84213bdb2fb9 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 20:46:00 -0400 Does COVID-19 increase the risk of bacterial infections in infants?
AI 预测 RNA 靶向 CRISPR 的脱靶活性根据《自然生物技术》发表的新研究，人工智能可以预测针对 RNA 而不是 DNA 的 CRISPR 工具的脱靶活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/AI-predicts-on-and-off-target-activity-of-RNA-targeting-CRISPRs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/AI-predicts-on-and-off-target-activity-of-RNA-targeting-CRISPRs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8cc2e644-5af9-4831-885e-e4a1b217a1f7 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 16:02:15 -0400 AI predicts on- and off-target activity of RNA-targeting CRISPRs
研究人员发现调节细胞脂质代谢的分子开关我们身体的脂肪代谢在我们身体的能量产生中起着至关重要的作用。瑞士巴塞尔大学的一个研究小组发现了一种调节细胞脂质代谢的分子开关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Researchers-discover-a-molecular-switch-that-regulates-lipid-metabolism-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Researchers-discover-a-molecular-switch-that-regulates-lipid-metabolism-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1be97b2a-e563-4903-8f2d-c7a862c63061 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 16:01:01 -0400 Researchers discover a molecular switch that regulates lipid metabolism in cells
病变网络映射识别出与癫痫相关的新脑回路局灶性癫痫影响全球超过 3000 万患者，通常由中风等脑部病变引起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Lesion-network-mapping-identizes-new-brain- Circuit-linked-to-epilepsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Lesion-network-mapping-identizes-new-brain-circ-linked-to-epilepsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dc42ace3-0db9-4226-b30e-94fe43cc4117 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 13:47:08 -0400 Lesion network mapping identifies new brain circuit linked to epilepsy
研究呼吁重新命名“肥胖”以更好地反映这种疾病一项新的研究表明，我们必须改变谈论肥胖的方式，以提高公众对这种疾病的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Study-calls-for-renaming-of-obesity-to-better-reflect-the-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Study-calls-for-renaming-of-obesity-to-better-reflect-the-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c499fce-ff18-4fd2-8f4e-f354d253b33f Mon, 03 Jul 2023 12:59:45 -0400 Study calls for renaming of 'obesity' to better reflect the disease
韩国研究人员开发出水凝胶，可以彻底改变女性不孕症的治疗健康保险审查评估院透露，去年有超过37万韩国人因不孕或受孕困难寻求医疗帮助。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Korean-researchers-develop-Hydrogel-that-c​​ould-revolutionize-treatment-for-female-infertility.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Korean-researchers-develop-Hydrogel-that-c​​ould-revolutionize-treatment-for-female-infertility.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=235e6fdc-b64c-48f6-a827-e97dfa7b33f4 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 12:49:58 -0400 Korean researchers develop hydrogel that could revolutionize treatment for female infertility
研究揭示细胞如何控制粘蛋白和胰岛素的释放巴塞罗那基因组调控中心 (CRG) 的研究人员在《自然通讯》杂志上发表了一项研究，揭示了细胞如何控制释放粘蛋白和胰岛素，这两种对人类健康至关重要的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Research-reveals-how-cells-carry-out-the-driven-release-of-mucins-and-insulin.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Research-reveals-how-cells-carry-out-the-driven-release-of-mucins-and-insulin.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a67c0aee-60a8-4812-9205-534d0cd454e4 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 12:32:00 -0400 Research reveals how cells carry out the controlled release of mucins and insulin
